questions.question: In what year and how did Hitler come to power in Germany?

choices.answer: He was elected in 1933
He seized power by force in 1933
He was elected in 1935
He seized power by force in 1935

questions.question: Why did Hitler pull out of the 1932-4 Disarmament conference?

choices.answer: He wanted to invade Europe later that year
He was offended when he did not get the best seat
France refused to disarm to the level of Germany
He wanted Anschluss with Austria

questions.question: What did Hitler then do immediately after the Disarmament Conference?

choices.answer: He invaded Poland
He withdrew Germany from the League of Nations in 1933

He re-militarised the rhineland

choices.answer: Britain, France and the USA

Germany, Italy and Japan

Germany allowed no submarines but as big a navy as it liked
